mention.text: a coin image of President Bakili Muluzi with that of his predecessor
Blantyre High Court Judge Eric Kumitsonyo
Mchamithe , who asked his pupils to measure the images during a lesson on circumference and circles
Banda , who died last year at age 99
a small man dwarfed by Muluzi , who is heavily built
remarks it published describing Muluzi as `` silly
